# Getting Started with the Microsoft Semantic Kernel

The Microsoft Semantic Kernel is a semantic search engine that enables you to
search for information in your organization based on concepts, rather than
keywords. The Microsoft Semantic Kernel is a component of the Microsoft
Enterprise Search Platform.
